profile:
The Home Improvement People have completed literally thousands of renovations since our inception. We are a unique award winning contracting company, consulted by various media as industry experts. 
Please view our website at homeimprovementpeople.com to view images of some of our projects. 
For our clients' convenience, we've implemented progress billing as well as financing.
Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship.
 
Our projects range from remodelled bathrooms and kitchens, to rear additions,  hardwood flooring, basements, second story additions and other extensive renovations. We undertake work in all budget ranges.
 
Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation. From plans and permits, to last little finishing details, The Home Improvement People is committed to completing your renovations and home improvements in a professional manner and to your complete satisfaction.
We take pride in our personalized service and our high quality workmanship. 
Call us for quality, insured work - completed on time, and on budget.
416-782-7605.

profile: For over 40 years, we have helped Ontario homeowners and builders build safer, more energy-efficient and sustainable communities. With a broad range of products and services, we are your insulation experts for existing home renovation upgrades and new residential home construction—satisfaction guaranteed. Proudly serving all of Southern Ontario, we are Ontario's largest insulation company and are Energy Star and Foam Masters™ certified. Get in touch for a Free In-Home Assessment—contact us today to learn more.
products:
✓ Spray Foam (1/2 lb open cell)
✓ HFO Spray Foam (2 lb closed cell), 
✓ Cellulose (Blown and dense-pack)
✓ Fibreglass (Batts, blown and blanket wrap)
✓ Mineral Wool (Batts)
✓ Hemp (Batts)
services:
We install insulation throughout the home:
✓ Attic Insulation 
✓ Walls Insulation 
✓ Basement Insulation 
✓ Crawlspace Insulation 
✓ Garage Insulation 
✓ Floors Insulation
brands: We offer high performance, brand name insulation backed by third party warranties. Our certified installers are professionally trained to install all types of insulation.

profile:
AGM Renovations experts provide quality basement and Bathroom Renovation services throughout the GTA and the surrounding area. See our Service Area for the complete list of towns where our  renovation services are offered. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and offer competitive prices with exceptional quality.

Expect more and when you need the best; trust AGM Renovations. We guarantee that you will be completely satisfied, which means that you don't pay until you are satisfied.
Our mission is to be committed to excel in the work we do. We are committed to excel and maintain a sense of pride in our all we do!

products: AGM Renovations, Basement finishing, Basement Renovations, Basement Reno, Finishing Basements, Basement Company, Finished Basements, Basement Expert, Finished Basements Company, Bathroom Renovations
services:
AGM Renovations offers Complete basement and Bathroom renovations packages from the professional design through the professional cleaning including:

Drywall- We employ only professional drywall installers and our goal is deliver complete satisfaction to each and every client with the quality of our workmanship and our prompt, reliable service.
    
Taping- Our drywall taping techniques will bring a high quality smooth finish, with a level of excellence you will take pride in.

Painting- We include all wall priming, painting of ceilings, baseboards, casing, crown and cove moldings into our basement construction packages
    
High Grade Laminate Flooring- is standard in our basement renovations packages.

Tiling- Shower, bathroom, or kitchenette tiling will be done by professional tile installers who are employed directly by AGM. A 2 year unlimited warranty is provided to you standard when you finish your basement with AGM
   
Plumbing- Our licensed plumbers will ensure that no problem is left unsolved and you can be sure that any drain or other plumbing defects left by the original house builder will be fixed effectively.

Electrical- We are committed to providing fully licensed electrician service as part of our standard package. Should you ever require an electrical certificate when you decide to sell your property, we will be happy to provide it to you

profile:
If you want QUALITY, CREATIVITY, RELIABILITY, and an overall ENJOYABLE experience, Purple Properties is the company you're looking for! For nearly 24 years now we have grown to understand what is needed in our market space, now allowing us to service happy clients all over the GTA.  

We have enjoyed producing an impressive body of work, lead by the Vision of our clients. The results naturally happen based on our core principles of PASSION, EXCELLENCE, & COMMITMENT. Our work and knowledge base is extremely diverse. We love to use STONE, HORTICULTURE, WOOD, TILES,  PAINTS along with other materials that become our art, your property being the canvas. Whether your project is interior or exterior, we can help! We look forward to co-creating with you in your next project! 

Purple Properties is fully licensed, insured, and up to date with WSIB. Our insurance and license are valid in the GTA for Interior and exterior projects.

Process:

Call for free estimate: 416-899-1572

Please visit our website at: www.purpleproperties.ca


Service area Keywords: Landscaing, Renovations, Kitchens, Bathrooms, Additions, Gardens, Design, Decks, Permits
GTA Home Additions, GTA Renovations, Toronto Home Additions, Toronto Renovations, Toronto Kitchen Renovations, Oakville Kitchen Renovations, Burlington Kitchen Renovations, Mississauga Kitchen Renovations, Vaughan Kitchen Renovations, Toronto Bathroom Renovations, Oakville Bathroom Renovations, Burlington Bathroom Renovations, Mississauga Bathroom Renovations, Vaughan Bathroom Renovations, Oakville Landscaping, Burlington landscaping, Mississauga Landscaping, Toronto Landscaping, Toronto Landscaping Companies, Vaughan Landscaping,

Any Interior and Exterior makeover we design & build, whether its a new kitchen, bathroom, basement, addition, cabinetry, Interlocking & natural stone, Trees and shrubs, flooring, painting, drywall, plumbing, electrical, concrete, asphalt, exposed aggregates, irrigation, carpentry, carpet installation, retaining walls, fences, waterfalls.

profile:
The Home Improvement Group is the premier One Stop Shop for all of your home and office renovations needs.  We have multiple divisions such as Perfect Painter, Affinity Renovations, Perfect Handyman and formally  Mr. Rescue to service all your needs. 

We service work form $400.00 to $500,000.00+ from our Painter and Handyman of the Day Service to  Home Additions and Major Renovation and Structural work.   We want to earn your trust and as a family owned business that delivers on providing outstanding home/office renovation work. 

Not convinced we have enough renovation reviews please see Perfect Painters & Home Renovations Services for a more detailed list on reviews.

We have a commitment to Quality work and dealing with a no risk contractor and we will always compete for your business.


We have also expanded our service areas to include Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Vaughan, Markham, Newmark, Aurora, Stouffville, Pickering and Oshawa.

Call or email us at sales@thig.pro for all your renovation needs

profile:
Singular Focus:

Most landscape and renovation companies try to serve many types of customers at the same time; homeowners, shopping centers, office buildings, golf courses, and the list goes on. They are pulled in all directions trying to be everything to everyone. At Captain Handy Co, we focus on one customer, you, the homeowner. We have a singular focus on bringing you the best landscaping and interior renovation, the best customer service, and the best value for your home. When you consider that quality renovation can improve the value of your home by 10%-15%, why wouldn’t you hire the one company that focuses specifically on residential landscaping? We are Your Residential Landscape and interior renovation Company.
Easy:

Our business makes your life easier. We are committed to improving the quality of life for our customers so they can spend their time on other things. Our customers are busy and have hectic lives. They do not have time to deal with different companies for lawn care, mowing, design, patio building. Captain Handy Co. offers turn-key solutions to your landscape needs. One call connects you with one of our very qualified Landscape Advisors who will make sure that you are delighted with your landscape. It is that easy.
Hassle-Free:

Ever notice how some companies make it a hassle just to do business with them? Who needs hassles? Life is complicated enough as it is. With Captain Handy Co, you can expect fast response times, clear and concise proposals, and work to be done how and when we promise it would be. You can also expect us to stand behind our work, show up when we say we will and take care of the little things that can take a landscape,renovation and experience, from blah to wow! We take away the hassles so all you have to do is enjoy your landscape.
Professional:

With 5 years under our belts, we know a thing or two about being the professional contractor of choice. Our staff has an average tenure rate of over twelve years, and some team members have been with us for over two decades! They undergo extensive and on-going training to not only assure that your renovation looks fantastic, but also to make sure that you are treated superbly. Our staff members are clearly recognizable in their sharp uniforms so you will know who is on your property. With so many companies claiming to be “professional”, isn’t it nice to work with a company that actually is?
Our Values:

At Captain Handy Co, we provide Tender Loving Care to both you and your interior and landscape renovation. These are our Values:
•	Treat people honestly, fairly and with respect in all situations
•	Create a comfortable environment in which to work and do business
•	Be open to problems and complaints, and work quickly to a fair resolution
•	Present a professional image and working safely
•	Have a “can-do” attitude
•	Stand behind our commitment to quality and service
•	Be active, responsible and positive citizens in the communities in which we work

Fine Finishes Design Inc. is a premier design and decorating firm serving the Greater Toronto area since 1997. 

We have a well earned reputation for attention to detail and professionalism in residential and commercial design.  Fine Finishes Design Inc. works closely with their clients and places special emphasis on understanding their unique needs, tastes and budget.  
Andrea Colman, the Principal Designer and Creative Director of Fine Finishes Design Inc. oversees each project personally ensuring the highest quality service.

Andrea graduated with the highest honours in the CIDC Design Program and is considered to be one of the best designers in the greater Toronto area.

Andrea is one of the founding members of The Benjamin Moore Painting and Decorating Services in North America and has sat on the Advisory Council for Benjamin Moore’s Painting and Decorating Services Canada.

profile:
Structural Restoration Systems is a family run business that has been servicing the Greater Toronto Area for over 40 years. Over this time we have gained the trust of many top home builders, property management companies and hundreds of individual homeowners. If you are looking for a trusted contractor, look no further your experience with us is the most important thing! We provide free quotes!  

**We've won 'best of' Homestars 4 years in a row for our customer service and workmanship**

We offer a variety of services that include but are not limited to; renovations (washrooms, basements, floor plan improvements, demolition etc.), drywall repairs, exterior waterproofing, interior foundation crack repairs, fences, decks, masonry repairs including; chimneys, brick replacement, tuck pointing and concrete repairs. We also provide mini excavator services. We have remained in business for over 40 years because we always give our customers the best experience possible. We pride ourselves on receiving repeat business and recommendations. Not sure if we can help you on your project, click above on the "get a quote" button, visit our website www.srstoronto.ca or give us a call. No job is too small!

_________________________________________________
 
Green Maple Home Renovations is focused on providing high –quality service and customer satisfaction.  It’s success comes from hard work, honesty and a feedback between contractor and customer on all stages of each project. 
 Renovating a house could be a stressful experience.  So, why renovating?
Because we make it easy for you and because just a kitchen, bathroom or a basement renovation will increase the value of your home for future sale or simply  to make your home more comfortable to live in now.
Our team will guide you through this process to make it a smooth and memorable renovation experience. 
 From frame to finish, we do it all . No matter how big or small your renovation project is, we're the company for the job. We are proud of our countless satisfied customers. Choose us for any renovation project, and you'll be glad you did.
 We would welcome the opportunity to earn your trust and help you to transform your living space delivering superior construction and design.
 
Why Green Maple? 
 
We are specialists in Kitchen, Bathroom and Basements Renovations.
 
We start with a consultation to map out your vision, requirements and budget for the projects. From there, we will develop a plan of action for the project and discuss a time frame.
 
Because we want you to feel involved throughout the entire project, you are welcome to get in touch with us at any time.
 
We will explain you what’s going on as the project takes shape, and discuss problems reasonably and will work with you to make the result as good as it can be.
 
We have the technical, business and interpersonal skills, the tools and the experience needed to do the job you want done. 
 
We have experience with projects similar to yours and we know what materials and techniques are needed for your work; and even better, about problems with similar work and how to solve them.
 
We are willing and able to help you refine your plans where possible, resulting in a more desirable and cost-effective project. 
 
We are knowledgeable about the type of work you’re doing and able to suggest ways to get what you want and meet your budget.
 
Before starting the job we will give you a fixed price which includes all the materials, labor, equipment and fees and will put everything in a signed contract.
 
From the initial consultation to the last service, we keep you abreast of our progress so you know exactly what we are doing and how much it costs. 
 
We know how to work efficiently with as little inconvenience to you as possible while still delivering a final product that surpasses your expectations.
 
We will give you one year warranty on all work and if during a year there's any issue we will fix it in a frame time of 24-72 hours after the first call .
 
Our professionalism, affordability and reliability have helped us build a client base that knows that we do not sacrifice quality for price.  
 
Our Company is committed to working within the budget of your project, ensuring that your renovation is completed on time delivering a high quality result.
 
We are also an Eco-friendly renovations company and we can help you to low your energy costs! 
 
Give us a call..! Our best proof of quality is satisfied customers.

We're social here:
https://www.facebook.com/GreenMapleHomeRenovations/

profile:
Full Service Renovation Services

Our experienced team of contractors can help you with any building project. From simple renovations to large scale projects, we can help you achieve your renovation goals. Our services include:

Kitchen Renovations
Bathroom Renovations
Basement Renovations
New Construction
Custom Building Projects
Our track record speaks for itself and we would love the opportunity to help you with your next home renovation project.

Why Choose Us?

With over 25 years’ experience in home renovations we firmly believe in having a small crew and completing one project at the time to ensure our customers are 100% satisfied with our work. Choose us because:

We have over 25 years of home renovation experience
We specialize in bathroom, basement and kitchen renovations
We serve our clients with integrity, reliability, skill and professionalism
We complete one project at a time. This means that you are our first priority.
We offer written contracts and a 1 year limited warranty.
100% customer satisfaction guaranteed
Ready to get your residential renovation project started? Call 416-677-9316 to get a project quote today!

A&R Renovation Inc is an affordable and reliable renovation company that works collaboratively with our clients to help then create their vision at minimum hassle or fuss. Whether working on a deck, a single room, or renovating a whole house or building from scratch, we plan meticulously, provide clear and honest quotes and deliver affordable and reliable services.
We have a highly qualified team and work in partnership with dependable and talented sub contractors including electricians, painters, ceramic tile  and dry wall installers  and plumbers. For complex projects, our core team is further enhanced with support from architects, structural engineers and kitchen and bathroom designers. 
Improving your home is a major investment and A&R Renovation strives to give you real value for your money .

profile:
Modular Home Additions has developed a revolutionary concept using sophisticated computer software and building techniques. In just days, a second storey addition or new home, custom designed to your needs, can be built. All structural building parts are designed and built in a climate controlled environment. This enables us to have a high quality level and build all year round without leaving your house vulnerable to weather conditions. There is minimal noise, dust and no mess.
Combining technology with excellent service, achieving your dreams is easier, faster and affordable. Using factory built components can save you up to 30% compared to conventional methods. And best of all, you are able to stay in your home during renovations without being inconvenienced. Our accurate quotation software ensures no hidden costs. This one-stop approach to renovating is a wise choice amongst many alternatives and gives you the optimum value for your home.

profile:
Why choose The Renovators of Canada?  
 
For over the past 20 years our focus on customer experience has helped The Renovators of Canada grow to locations in Durham, Aurora, Stouffville, Markham, Vaughan, Toronto, Hamilton, Guelph, Kitchener, Waterloo, Barrie, Oshawa, Oakville and Cambridge. 
 
Unique to the industry, The Renovators of Canada provides a 10 year warranty on all craftsmanship. This home renovation warranty protection was established to provide peace of mind as home and business owners contemplate renovating a personal or commercial space. 
 
T-ROC is a fully licensed and insured including WSIB. Other affiliations include memberships with the National Kitchen and Bath Association, CARAHS, Better Business Bureau.  
 
We have a proven track record working with our customers with full transparency in every aspect of your project.  Can’t be present all the time during the renovation process?  No worries, we have specialized client software that allows you to see the entire schedule and pictures as the project happens in real time. We care for your home like it’s our own and always conduct ourselves respectfully and professionally.  
 
With our motivated and innovative professionals we will transform your house and make your dream home a reality.  Visit our website at www.trocanada.com

profile:
RM Renovation is a Toronto based renovation company with more than 20 years experience in the field.
.
WE ARE THE TEAM OF PROFESSIONALS WHO PERFORM KITCHEN, BATH OR BASEMENT RENOVATIONS ACCORDING TO YOUR PERSONAL PROJECT.
.
Our major activities are renovating basements, kitchens and bathrooms at reasonable prices. Trusting such works to us our clients have convinced in their quality and fast performing. We provide high-quality construction and renovation services as well as give maximum guarantee for our services. Depending on the project we perform our interior design, wall insulation and finishing.

Our advantages:

Quality and efficiency. We provide preparing and performing works as soon as possible.
Years of experience. We are in the renovation services market for many years and have an excellent reputation and hundreds of grateful customers.
Individual approach. We approach responsibly to perform each order and find the best options for the task as well as advise customers in order to meet all their individual needs.
Highly qualified specialists. We are a team of professionals and perform our work efficiently and reliably. Our employees keep their skills always according to the up to date requirements.
Customers positive reviews. We have a lot of positive feedback from the customers.
.
.
Basement renovation:

Basement in a private house more often perceived as a technical room: storeroom for garden tools or a cellar to store the harvest. Meanwhile, the basement is easy can turn into a full room to organize here, for example, a vinotheque, bar, home theatre or billiard room. The kitchen in the basement is also becoming a very popular modern solution. Construction and repair of the basement or ground floor, of course, will transform your home by adding not only the living space but also personality.

The following work can be done during the basement renovation.

Waterproofing. This is necessary if the moisture on the room walls revealed.

Heating. If the room is designed for staying long (kitchen, library, bathroom), it should be warm enough in any case.

Thermal insulation. This feature will save on heating and prevent heat loss into the ground and it will greatly enhance the energy efficiency of the whole building.

Lighting. If the basement has a small level above the soil it can be equipped with energy-saving windows. Additional electric light point sources using LED lamps will be created as well.

Soundproofing will be installed if the basement room contains equipment that generates big noise (e.g. water pumps etc.).

Water supply and sewerage. These works are performed accordingly to the local water company. Additional pumps can be installed if necessary.

Networks for the power supply, LAN or television can be laid, so it will provide you with maximum comfort.
.
.
Kitchen renovation:

The kitchen is one of the most visited places in your house. That is why it is so important that this room should be cozy and functional. We will do for you all kinds of our works for any areas of the rooms, from small to large ones. These will be the following:

1. Replacing the wires.

2. Aligning the surfaces of the ceiling and walls.

3. Laying the floor and wall tiles.

4. Floor, ceiling and general kitchen equipment installation.

5. Kitchen windows replacement.

6. Home appliances integration.

We always use safe and easy to wash materials.
.
.
Bathrooms renovation:

We are trying to renovate the bathroom as soon as possible because we well know this room is essentially the most important thing in your home. This type of repair involves the following:

1. Initial preparing the room, dismounting the wires, old tiles and plumbing communications.

2. Installation of new wiring, plumbing pipes, risers.

3. Preparing the walls, floor and ceiling.

4. Installation the new door and windows.

5. Installing the tiles on the floor and walls.

6. Installation of the new ceiling and lighting.

7. Installation of new connections to the water supply and sanitation.

8. Installation of all sanitary equipment and electric wash machine if needed.

We work at any time convenient for you. We are looking forward to meeting you!
specialities: Kitchen Renovation; Bathroom Renovation; Basement Renovation; Full House Renovations
name: RM Renovation

Established in 2013, City EdgePoint Construction Inc. offers an extensive set of renovation, repair, and home management services.  We are experts in all types of Home Additions, Kitchens, Bathrooms, Basements, and from commercial renovations to residential remodeling, we provide a comprehensive resource for the GTA.

When you decide to renovate, you need a contractor with a detailed understanding of your project.  City EdgePoint takes an innovative approach that combines high service standards with superior customer service.  We keep you informed with regular progress reports, and each of our trade partners is evaluated through an extremely strict screening process.  When you want results, you need City EdgePoint.

Visit our website for more information.  To get a quote, call us today or send us an email.

profile:
Jiang's Home Renovation Inc consists teams of true hardworking Asian employees. 

Our main values are customer satisfaction and best quality jobs.

We specialize in: 
* Full House Renovation -> approximately 2  -3 months from basement to third floor
* Full Basement renovation (From start to finish approximately 4 weeks)
* Bathroom/Kitchen Refacing (New backsplash,vanity,cabinets, counter-tops installation) 
* Ceramic, Porcelain or any other types of Tile Installation - 100% flat/level result
* Vinyl, Hardwood, Engineered wood or Laminate Flooring 
* Interior and Exterior paintings include rooms, ceilings, garage doors, windows,doors, deck and fences. 
* Crown Moulding, Drywall, concrete repairs, Gutter cleaning /windows/doors caulking or re-caulking 
* Lights/furniture dissemble and re-assemble  

***Golden Rule*** -100% customer satisfaction.

- send us a picture or two of the design you want, we will communicate, help design and work with your budgets in order to achieve expected maximum result.

We have expanded and own a crew of professional team doing exterior jobs: Backyard landscaping, New fencing, Decking, Interlocking at a very satisfactory price. 

Referrals available upon request.


Any small or big jobs, we take them seriously, give us a chance to show you that we are worth hiring.

profile:
Q.E.W. Contracting Ltd. is well known in the greater Toronto area and has a great reputation as a quality builder.  High quality workmanship is very important to us, no shortcuts are taken that will compromise the end result.  We are responsible for your final product and as our history has shown, we look after and service what we build.
Your Home is your greatest asset.  Our clients expect the highest level of personal attention and the finest quality construction delivered on time and for a price that undercuts the competition.  We make it our business to exceed our customer's expectations with over 30 years of experience.
With careful planning and the assistance of Q.E.W. Contracting Ltd., most untapped spaces can be turned into attractive, comfortable living areas.  Whatever the home improvement or renovation project you may have, Q.E.W. Contracting Ltd. will execute your need with a professional design.
 
Call us toll-free at 1-888-491-7612
services:

- Painting.
- Railings.
- Asphalt driveways.
- Plumbing: rough-ins, toilet, vanity, shower control(all work done by a licensed plumber).
- Seamless glass enclousres.
- Garages.
- Electrical: re-wire, pot lights, ceiling fans, electrical panels, outlets/switches (all work done by a licenced electrician).
- Awnings.
- Shingled roofing.
- Tiling (kitchen, bathroom, laundry room, etc.).
- Flooring installation (ceramic tiles, hardwood, laminate, engineered wood, carpeting).
- Drywall.
- HVAC: fireplace installations.
- Carpentry: trim, baseboards, casings, custom millwork, etc.
specialities:

- All types of natural stone:  walkways, porch/stair overlays, patios, pool surrounds.
- Natural flagstone repairs.
- Partial or total kitchen, bathroom and basement renovations.
- Eavestrough, soffits, fascia, leaf guards and siding.
- Replacement doors and windows.
- Waterproofing (interior/exterior).

- Patio rebuilding.
- Interlock and paver stones.
- Retaining garden walls.

profile:
Direct Pro Windows and Doors had been providing quality windows and doors in Toronto and surrounding areas for over 10 years. 

We offer a huge selection of standard and custom built windows, ranging from basic vinyl, single slider and casement windows, to classic options like bay windows and bow windows. Any window we install can also include beautiful interior wood cladding. In addition, we provide quality door installation for residential entrance and exterior doors, front doors, patio doors, sliding doors, and storm doors. In addition to standard materials like wood, wrought iron, steel, and glass, we also offer fiberglass doors made by Weber Manufacturing Technologies.

profile:
Level Up Basement goal is customer satisfaction, we know that every happy client brings 3 more contracts, and this is how we grew for 10 year of company existence.

That’s why we focus on quality assurance in everything: choosing the best materials, minimizing our response time to one hour max, always staying within our promised roadmap and never delaying projects.

Our approach is a “boutique style” dedicated management. Mike, company owner, always consults with the customer for every stage of the project, checking his teams progress on each location on a daily basis, doesn’t allow any small detail to escape his expert eye.

We choose the best designers, only licensed trade workers and work in every basement as if it were our house.

Our projects range from handyman services to flooring, door and trim installations to bathroom, basement and kitchen renovations to full home/condominium and commercial renovations. We Specialize in Bathroom Renovation, Basement renovation, Bathroom Remodeling, and Kitchen Renovations. All finish and trim carpentry such as, crown molding, baseboards, door installations, casing, wainscoting, drywall, and taping. We undertake work in all budget ranges while providing top quality work with hopes to exceed your expectations. We commit to completing your project in an organized, professional manner. We take pride in tailoring our services to your needs. Our personal expectations demand quality and insured work, completed on time. Do not hesitate to contact us for any questions. Contact us today to schedule your appointment.

profile:
Finding your perfect home renovation partner can understandably be a daunting process these days. With so many options and potential risks, people are looking for a partner they can trust.

That's why Royal Home Improvements (RHI) retains single-source responsibility from start to finish. Our hand's on approach ensures your needs are met, from concept to construction. Whether architectural design, the quality of construction, or our strict adherence to timelines and budget, RHI guarantees everything we do and make sure that our customers are satisfied with every facet of our work.

Building trust takes years of delivering on time and budget. It requires committed professionals and a refined process model. But ultimately, it's about respect and owning ones word. This hasn't changed since we open our doors in 1969. Proudly serving the Greater Toronto Area, Royal Home Improvements today is one of the largest multi-phased renovators in Canada.

What can we do for you?

profile:
Owning a home is one of the most important financial and sentimental assets that one can have. Beyond building a financially reliable base, you want a home to match your lifestyle and your dreams. When you work with TK Contracting, you’re going to be getting a service that exceeds all expectations through our licensed and bonded tradespeople. 

Our Company
We at TK Contracting Inc.  Are passionate about the work we do. Our commitment is to work with our clients in order to achieve the best results in the project with a safe and timely manner.  We are dedicated to provide our clients with a high level of satisfaction. 

Heath and Safety Protocols
Our policy at TK Contracting is to maintain a safe working environment for everyone. Compliance with health and safety regulations are all outlined in the health and safety policy of TK Contracting.  Our employees are all trained yearly to follow these safety protocols. In order to reduce the risk of injuries at the workplace. 

COVID19 Precautions 
To keep our clients and workers safe, all workers will have a temperature check, and a log to record. All workers shall sanitize before Jobsite, and wear a mask during the entire day. TK Contracting makes sure every team member is tested before working. We are one of the few companies who follow these precautions.

Guaranteed Workmanship 
Our company ensures that each project is handled with good quality materials and professional knowledge to achieve the highest level of satisfaction. We provide a quality service on every project. TK Contracting offers a free written guarantee of 12 months from the date of completion.

profile:
Master Of Consistency and Quality specializing in : Basements, washrooms, kitchens, hardwood/laminate flooring, decking/fencing.

Roger Caissie came to Toronto from New Brunswick when he was just 16. Right off the bat, he took a couple of odd jobs as a handyman, eventually only to join his brother and his partner Ray in their drywall and taping business. With time, Roger grew to learn more about not just drywalling and taping but also about other aspects of construction. 

Once he had several years of experience under his belt and had been exposed to all aspects of construction and home renovation, Roger founded RJ Renovations.

At RJ Renovations, Roger didn’t want to force his choices on his clients, like the rest of his competition did to make more money. He wanted to leave that choice entirely to the customer so they could build something of their imagination and stay within their budget. Roger also operated with his mantra, which eventually became the business’ mantra: Doing it right the first time is cheaper than doing it over. This is why Roger and his entire team don’t believe in taking shortcuts when working on a project. They do things the right way first time around which leads to total and complete customer satisfaction by the end of the project. 

Roger’s a seasoned trades person with over 45 years in the industry, all by himself. Couple that with the experience of the rest of his team and we’re talking over 75 years of hard earned experience in construction and home renovations, but more importantly in helping people realize their home renovation dreams.

profile:
Reno-building is a licensed Ontario-based design-build-renovation contractor established in 2017 that services to the Greater Toronto Area (GTA). Reno-building is a fully insured, licensed and WSIB compliant company which provides Architecture, General Contracting, Construction Management and Build to serve Residential, Retailers, Medical professionals, Commercial and Industrial clients. Reno-building has a strong quality culture, a professional and experienced team, and industry-leading efficiencies.
Mission:

Offer value-added renovation at a competitive rate, honest service

while responsible for quality and always looking for innovation.
Vision:

Leading renovation company in the GTA.

 
Values:

We do what we say we will do.

We achieve value-added results.

We are constantly focused on our job.

We are committed to continuous learning and excellence.

 

Reno Building is a qualified, experienced and trusted renovation company that excels in all aspects of the industry. Reno building renovates everything from residential house to multi-unit, commercial and industrial facilities, followed by complete site architecture and modelling. Satisfied repeat clientele and their referrals have brought Reno Building to where it is today. Our renovation project portfolio showcases the depth of our knowledge and skill in the industry, spanning projects large and small in the commercial, industrial, health care and residential sectors.

Your Home Renovation, Reimagined.



Model Concepts provides a fully managed renovation service that combines high-quality design, materials, and construction into a single, stress-free home renovation experience.

Premium designs that incorporate the latest trends in architecture and interior design. Done by our award-winning architectural designers to maximize the potential of your space.

Material sourcing and procurement. We've curated the best fixtures and materials from the world's best brands, and we have access to insider pricing. With Model Concepts, you can forget about paying retail markups.

High-quality construction completed by our network of highly-vetted, licensed, and insured contractors and trades.

Established in 1989, we have done many high quality projects in Toronto and the surrounding area: Small jobs, medium sized renovations like basements, bathrooms and kitchens, all kinds of outdoor projects, larger whole home renovations, and new home construction. 

Over the past 30 plus years, we've done a large variety of projects and our focus is to do good quality work for a fair price. Our jobsites are tidy, our workers are polite and professional and we enjoy what we do. 

We believe that communication and maintaining a friendly and good working relationship with our customers is key to any project moving along smoothly.

Jim

profile:
Lions Den Construction is a general construction company that specializes in residential, commercial, and medical construction and renovations. Our company is committed to seeing projects through to the end. That is why we have a dynamic and experienced team that can handle any renovation request. From building to design to landscaping, we can provide it all.

We are dedicated to producing a quality product and providing professional, responsive customer service. We will complete all projects with the highest quality, on time and within the budget given to our clients. Long term working relationships with all our clients is a must.

We have clients in Toronto, Richmond Hill, Markham, North York, Thornhill, Mississauga, Oakville and all GTA area.

profile:
Your Home Renovation, Reimagined.



Model Concepts provides a fully managed renovation service that combines high-quality design, materials, and construction into a single, stress-free home renovation experience.



With Model Concepts, you will experience a stress-free home renovation experience;
Premium designs that incorporate the latest trends in architecture and interior design. Done by our award-winning architectural designers to maximize the potential of your space.

Material sourcing and procurement. We've curated the best fixtures and materials from the world's best brands, and we have access to insider pricing. With Model Concepts, you can forget about paying retail markups.

High-quality construction completed by our network of highly-vetted, licensed, and insured contractors and trades.

profile:
"My Prestigious Home" is where you need to be...

MPH has been a leader in major renovations and custom home construction since 2007. From concept to completion, we take a client’s vision and make it a reality through a comprehensive process to ensure the finished product exceeds expectations. Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your project and better to say, your investment. From plans and permits, to last little finishing details, MPH is committed to completing your renovations and home improvements in a professional manner and to your complete satisfaction.

Our vast professional experience, skilled expertise and attention to details enable us to offer you innovative solutions, competitive pricing and the ability to meet milestones. We appreciate how much your project means to you. That’s why we approach each project with professionalism, integrity and adaptability while maintaining open communication with you every step of the way.
We pride ourselves in Home additions, renovations, custom home building, commercial renovations, condominium renovations and design and build projects.

We understand custom homes and renovations are amongst the most important investment to people in their lifetime. So whether it be a new architecturally designed or inspired home, or a renovation and extension of your existing home, you can be guaranteed that MPH is most definitely the qualified team for your project.

We have had the opportunity to transform your dreams into reality by designing rooms where you can relax and your children can safely play. We have enjoyed being a part of homeowners’ lives and strive to continue to provide our customers with the best technology on the market. We have completed literally hundreds of renovations since our inception. 

Please view our website at http://MyPrestigiousHome.com to view images of some of our projects.

Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship.

Our projects range from building new custom homes, home additions and extensions, condominium renovations, architectural design and permit, structural engineering, commercial renovations, rear addition, second floor addition, basement underpinning, custom kitchen and bathrooms, residential renovations and finally we design and build everything. We take pride in our personalized service and our high quality workmanship.

With 2 year Warranty, we at MPH know how to design and build lasting results and lasting relationships with each of our highly respected clients.

Our focus is on Custom projects such as custom Kitchen renovations, Basement Finishing and underpinning, Bathroom Renovation and Bathroom Remodeling, Home Additions, Second Story Additions, Rear Additions, Home Extensions and Rear Extensions, commercial renovations, office renovation, architectural drawings, permit and etc. We work with some of the top architects, interior designers, engineers and sub-trades in Toronto. We are the all inclusive General Contractor who will take care of all your design and general contracting needs.

MPH is an innovative, full service design/build/construction firm based in Toronto, specializing in residential clients across the GTA. With decades of construction management experience on a wide variety of residential projects, we offer a strong design aesthetic, invaluable insight, vast resources and craftsman that exceed client expectations.

Strong leadership and communication skills are the essential components necessary to navigate a construction project from concept to completion. Our extensive knowledge of all trade areas involved in both new construction and sophisticated renovations have proven invaluable to our company and our clients. Our recognition of the importance of scheduling, cost control, and quality control underlies and defines our successful completion of many challenging projects on time and within budget.

There are many different reasons to work with us: to make room for a growing family, to improve layout or increase the resale value of your property! Our team of professionals offer customers design and build counselling along with skilled trades and top discounts, on top brands.

There is no substitute for experience. Join the list of satisfied clients! In the end the quality of your project depends on who you hire. When you hire us, you do so because of our company’s reputation, our track record with past clients and our commitment to new ones.

Contact us for a free "No Pressure" estimate and let us help you take the first step to completing your project. Advice is always free. Remember, we are talking about Professional Advice from Skilled Engineer.
Our areas of servings are in Toronto, Beaches, Etobicoke, Mississauga, Richmond hill, Markham, Foresthill, Royal York, Vaughan, Woodbridge, East York, West end, Central Toronto, North York, & Downtown Toronto.

"My Prestigious Home"
Impact on Community, Providing Quality

memberships: Professional Engineers Ontario, TARION, HCRA, OSPE

Strong leadership and communication skills are the essential components necessary to navigate a construction project from concept to completion. Our extensive knowledge of all trade areas involved in both new construction and sophisticated renovations have proven invaluable to our company and our clients. Our recognition of the importance of scheduling, cost control, and quality control underlies and defines our successful completion of many challenging projects on time and within budget.

There are many different reasons to work with us: to make room for a growing family, to improve layout or increase the resale value of your property! Our team of professionals offer customers design and build counselling along with skilled trades and top discounts, on top brands.

There is no substitute for experience. Join the list of satisfied clients! In the end the quality of your project depends on who you hire. When you hire us, you do so because of our company’s reputation, our track record with past clients and our commitment to new ones.

Contact us for a free "No Pressure" estimate and let us help you take the first step to completing your project. Advice is always free. Remember, we are talking about Professional Advice from Skilled Engineer.
Our areas of servings are in Toronto, Beaches, Etobicoke, Mississauga, Richmond hill, Markham, Foresthill, Royal York, Vaughan, Woodbridge, East York, West end, Central Toronto, North York, & Downtown Toronto.

"My Prestigious Home"
Impact on Community, Providing Quality

profile:
With over 15 years experience The Blanas Group Design + Construction is a full service licensed full design-build renovation firm.  We specialize in all interior alterations to any property.  We thrive on all our full interior remodels, legal basement apartments and kitchens. 

We also have a separate division for kitchen and bath sale and installations.  We are authorized distributor of Canadian made semi customizable ready to assemble kitchen cabinetry  and bathroom vanities; which we offer sale and installation services for.  We also offer other kitchen items such as kitchen sinks, range hoods and kitchen hardware.  

We service all of the GTA including but not limited to:  Toronto, Etobicoke, Vaughan, Woodbridge, Concord,  Maple, Thornhill, King City, Nobelton, Kleinburg, Richmond Hill, Brampton, Bolton,  North York, Downsview, Oshawa, Ajax, Pickering, Whitby, New Castle, Bomanville, Barrie

profile:
Hello Viewer! 

We offer full turn key solutions for interiors and exterior renovations for a variety of building types. Working at a range of scales, from custom renovation projects for residential market to adaptive reuse of small commercial buildings. The team lists beauty, practicality, and social and environmental sustainability as essentials for ‘healthier and happier buildings’.  


We specialize in the design and renovation management of a variety of spaces which can differ in size and function.  It is through our free consultation that  a picture is painted on what your project and budgetary requirements are.   We will hold your hand as tight as you require and ensure that we listen to your wants and needs.  Once we have a clear picture of scope and budget, our team will estimate and design your space for you accordingly with years of experience and education backing our every decision.   


There is no project to small and no renovation project to large for us to handle.  
-We work with a variety of agents who have clients moving into their new 2 story properties or condos which have very tight time lines.  We have accomplished full 3 story (including basement) renovations in 5 weeks flats when necessary.  
-We have many recurring clients which use our services for each challenge they face.  If you aren't ready to do a full project in a single swing,  we can help you break down the project into proper stepping stones to spend where necessary and when necessary. 


We are a phone call or email away and would be honored to work with you.

profile:
Welcome to ZAFCON INC your professional expert contractor. 

WHO WE ARE
Our company team consist of project managers, engineers, designers, construction and renovation specialists who are experts in their field. This team has worked successfully together to help our customers achieve their construction objective and dream renovations.

OUR CORE VALUES

Safety - We are commitment to safety to ensure everyone can return to their loved ones at the end of the day. As a result, we ensure all team members and all work is in compliance with safety regulations,  WSIB and Covid-19 protocols.

Quality - Quality distinguishes best from the rest. Our craftsmanship approach ensures that all of our clients receive nothing but the best quality service.

Integrity - We don't take the convenient approach but rather the RIGHT one, even if no one is watching.  

Transparency - The most important core value for us is to ensure our customers receive clear terms and conditions upfront. This will help us build long lasting relationships which further fosters our team culture across all levels of skills and management. 

Services we offer:

Full Home Renovations
Home Extensions and Upgrades
Basement Renovations
Kitchen & Bathroom Renovations

Check out our website for more pictures and to get an estimates on your next project or simply call us to discuss what is possible (647) 785-2929

 We are open for business and we are following all Covid-19 regulations.

profile:
Welcome to Open Concept 

The company specializes in structural engineering and renovations. OCEC LTD was founded to be able to help others live their lives without unwanted obstructions. It may be a wall, a duct hump or post in the basement that is in the way of your pool table or a home gym or simply in the middle of a room. Whatever the case may be it’s not IM'possible. Our innovative approach to basement post removal has been designed and approved by qualified engineers with many satisfied customers. The method does not require any welding or major beam replacements. We have also made it possible through our ingenuity to be able to sink beams into the joists to have a perfectly flat ceiling finish on both the first and/or second floors of your home.

We are an insured business from both and engineering and construction stand point. 

Liability Insurance on Construction and Engineering Services. 

We're social here:
https://www.instagram.com/ocecltd/
https://www.facebook.com/ocecltd
https://twitter.com/OpenConceptEng1
services:
Basement Post Removals
Wall Removals
Load Bearing Wall Removal 
Engineering Services 
Floor & Ceiling Leveling 
Air Duct Relocation
specialities:
Basement Steel Post Removal with structural reinforcement to existing beam. No welding and no mess with new larger beams. 

Wall removals

Air duct "hump" under beam removal

profile:
Whether you are undertaking a small home renovation or are in the planning phases of large-scale commercial development, Wolfsview Construction Inc. is here to better serve you.  We combine design to build and trades expertise, to excel at every stage of your project. 

Our qualified team of professionals is knowledgeable in all areas of construction – residential, commercial, corporate and industrial. We ensure that our projects are handled by the most qualified professionals, to suit the specific needs of our clients. As a trusted General Contractor,  we maintain responsibility for the day-to-day oversight of the construction site, from start to finish.  Our administrative staff liaises in an organized fashion at the earliest phases of project management in order to connect you with skilled tradespeople you can rely on, to ensure optimal safety in the workplace and to guarantee satisfaction upon project completion.

We take pride in working cohesively with you throughout the course of a project, so that the client can step back and watch a renovation come together, stress-free! 

When clients put their trust in us,  we have one specific goal in mind: to provide cost-effective, labor-efficient construction solutions, with environmental and work safety obligations as the pillars of our day to day operations.

profile:
About Us
Hausvio Inc is a leading Toronto-based home renovations company. We pride ourselves on our eco-friendly, innovative, and professional approach to all of our home renovation projects. From a brand new kitchen or bathroom to whole house projects, our team works hard to transform your living spaces completely.
​
We believe in a more personal approach to home renovation projects. By working closely with our clients, understanding their goals, and working hard to craft solution-focused designs allows us to create beautifully crafted, functional living spaces.
OUR TEAM
The Hausvio is made of professional, experienced carpenters with over a decade in the industry. Each member is well-known and admired in their field for exceptional quality, attention to detail, and talent. We also collaborate with other local professionals, including Architects, Engineers, Kitchen & Bathroom Designers, Electricians, Plumbers, and other specialized personnel, to guarantee we are providing the highest level of service and care for our clients.

MEET THE FOUNDER
Owner/ CEO Wilson is a Licenced Professional Engineer with over five years of experience in the home renovation field. Wilson is passionate about implementing the best methods and practices to help reduce Hausvio’s carbon footprint.

Hausvio is pursuing a LEED (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design) Certificate. LEED is the most widely used green building rating system in Canada and across the globe. LEED is a proven and holistic path to addressing climate change. At Hausvio, we’re committed to creating more resource-efficient, healthy, and resilient homes without compromising design aesthetics, quality, or living convenience.

WHY GO GREEN
Protects Our Ecosystem: Efficient Use of Resources & Energy
Healthier Indoor Environment: Improved Quality of Life
Energy-Efficient: Reduced Operational Cost and Maintenance
Lower Maintenance and Operation Costs
Reduces Strain on Local Resources
services:
Our Services
Your home should perfectly reflect your style, taste, and lifestyle. We listen to your needs, goals, and visions and flawlessly align them with the best building practices to deliver the best possible outcomes for your living spaces.
Kitchen
The kitchen is the heartbeat of the home. At Hausvio, we create kitchens that work for your family, design choices, and your way of living. From contemporary and modern renovations to open concepts and traditional styles, Hausvio works with you to create beautiful, functional kitchens that complement your home’s aesthetic. 
 
Bathroom
Create a luxurious sanctuary in your home. Bathrooms are a place where you can relax, refresh, and rejuvenate. Our team has experience remodeling various bathroom styles, including ensuites, power rooms, and main bathrooms. Whether you want to create a spa-like oasis with a thermostatic shower system or just refresh your cabinetry, our team can help. 
Whole House
Let us help you make your house a home. If you need significant upgrades to your living space to make it work for you and your family, we offer complete house renovations. Typically, whole house renovations include major elements like the kitchen, bathrooms, interior finishes, flooring, and mechanical systems (electrical, plumbing, and HVAC). 
Basement
Finished basements add additional living space while significantly increasing your property value. We offer fully customizable basement renovations to fit your needs. Our team can add vital functional living space and much-needed storage to upgrade your lifestyle. To add even more value to your home, talk to us about including sub-flooring, lighting, a wet bar, laundry room, built-ins, and upgrading insulation.

Welcome to Simply Exquisite, we are a construction and renovations general contractor in Toronto, serving the GTA and surrounding areas.

For over 20 years we have worked with property and homeowners providing them with high caliber commercial and home renovation services. We have earned our reputation as one of the best general contractors in the GTA through our trade expertise and professionalism. We are customer-service driven, pay extra attention to details, and deliver a quality product, on time and budget.

We approach every project with this simply promise: Every home renovation, general contracting, and construction project will be Simply Exquisite. That is our guarantee.

Whether you are looking to do a home renovation in Toronto, from kitchen design and renovations, to bathroom remodels and basement finishing, or something smaller like having your kitchen refaced or installing basement heated flooring, you can trust the best construction company in Toronto to give you the peace of mind of a job well done.

We offer award-winning renovation services that come with a 5-year warranty. We provide in-house design services and counseling, free of charge, with a licensed architectural designer. We extend this added value with every one of our projects so that you can be sure that your project will satisfy your needs.

profile:
OUR PROCESS

 

When working with GTCC, you will have access to knowledgeable professionals working cohesively to provide you with a finished product you can be proud of for years to come. We will provide honest answers and insights to any questions or querries you have throughout the process.

First, you will start with a free consultation and estimate. This is where we will go over all of your options and approximate budgets. If you're seeking help with a smaller renovation (kitchen, bathroom, basement), we will provide you a fixed price in this phase.

Should you decide to move forward with us for a custom home addition design paclage, you will then move into the design phase. This is where you will meet with our architects and designers and together come up with a uniquely custom-tailored plan for your new custom renovation or addition.

Once we have engineered drawings for your project, we will then cost the project based on these approved drawings and provide you with a fixed price to execute the work in a timely fashion.

When we have agreed on the scope of work and price the real planning for us begins. We will provide you a project schedule and approximate start and completion date. Product will be ordered and we will be on our way.

Throughout the construction phase of the project, we will be in constant contact with you. We will keep you apprised of any pertinent information regarding your project through email and set weekly meetings.

When the work is complete, we will do a final walkthrough to discuss any potential deficiencies that must be fixed (on our dollar) and hand over the keys to your new home.

profile:
Summitcrest Group approaches each project with a structured process that is driven by a strong commitment to transparency, knowledge and collaboration. A process designed to instill trust, confidence and ensure quality.
***
In the initial phase of the project we will meet with our clients to discuss their expectations, timelines and budget. We carefully examine the scope of the project to identify and challenges that may impact timelines, budget and work.  We have over 40 years experience. 
***
Once the work is underway we communicate with our clients regularly to discuss the status of the project and address and concerns or thoughts they may have along the way.
At the completion of the project, we will meet with our clients again to address and deficiencies that may require attention. 
***
Our goal is to ensure a successful and stress free renovation project that is delivered with quality workmanship.

A & A Home Repair Services was founded by Greg Cherebin.

Greg had his basment bathroom renovated a couple of years ago and felt he was not given the customer satisfaction that should come with using a reputable company. To make a long story short this effected Greg deeply and he decided to build a company to take care of clients and listen to what they are looking for.

Greg Cherebin is well rounded in customer service, and has an extensive knowledge of Basment and Bathroom renovations. 

The TEAM at A & A Home Repair Services focuses on customer satisfaction 100% We understand what makes a client happy. Honesty,Transperancy, Reliability Affordability and Quality.

These areas are key to having a successful business with happy clients.

Call for your free quote today.

We look forward to speaking with you have a great productive day.

At ACG INC we build homes, not houses! 

Our experts have been providing quality general contractor services to our valuable customers since 2017. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and we offer competitive prices with exceptional quality. Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship. We will also happily assist you with obtaining permits, choosing design and  architecture. 

Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation, so you can reach out to ACG INC. with upmost confidence.

profile:
SPECIALIZING IN COMMERCIAL & RESIDENTIAL
At Concepts 2 Completion Inc., we are proud to focus our services on homes and businesses in the surrounding areas.

We have Over 25 years of experience . We have the tools and expertise to get the job done right from your concept to the completed product.

When you enlist the help of our contractors, you can rest assured that the systems in your home or business are safe, fortified, and built to last for years to come.

A COMMITMENT TO CUSTOMER SATISFACTION
When it comes to delivering superior electrical services, one must focus on what is important. For us, what's important is providing safe and reliable repairs and New installations and maintaining the satisfaction of our valued customers. We owe our clients the continued success of our business, and it is for them that we make sure to never waver in our commitment to excellence.

Before we perform any job or service for our clientele, we map out a detailed plan to ensure that the work is done efficiently and with the expertise that our clients have come to expect.

When you work with our team, you can anticipate:

24/7 availability
Free quotes
Licensed experts
Insured and bonded services
Customer satisfaction follow-ups
2-year labour warranty
Courteous contractors

CONCEPTS 2 COMPLETION INC.: TIMELY AND COURTEOUS 

The business world is extremely fast-paced because, as the saying goes, time is money. Unfortunately, because of this mindset, we have lost some of the most important aspects of human interaction. While many companies will prioritize finishing the job as quickly as possible, at Concepts 2 Completion Inc., we make time for our clients. We want our clients to know that when you deal with us, it is not business as usual. We take the time necessary not only to get the job done but also to get to know our clients and provide high-quality services that meet their unique needs. We encourage our clients to speak freely with us so that we can make sure that their expectations are met and exceeded.

profile:
As an innovative, creative new home builder, JII FINE HOMES has redefined the experience of luxury home living for families who dream only the best. The company’s President, Jim has been actively involved for 20 years in all facets of marketing residential, multi-residential and commercial properties. Noting a lack of high-quality homes being built for discerning clients who wanted something above the ordinary, Jim has raised the bar when it comes to the creation of custom-designed luxury residences exuding architectural excellence and inspiring, spacious interiors.

JII Home Improvement is committed to creating your dream home. From something cozy, economic, and yet good looking with luxurious qualities to two story houses and large mansions, we will build it for you. Our teams of reputable builders and craftsmen turn your dream home to a reality. A place to build and have good memories for generations! We know what you need to obtain a building permit for your property. Our knowledge and know how will ensure your peace of mind.

For clients who already own a property but have not begun the design process, JII can help you design your dream home. Distinctive architectural plans, each with leading edge technologies and exquisite features are synonymous with JII FINE HOMES. 

Trust JII to build your next home or major renovation. JII renovations and additions can include architectural and interior design, obtaining all municipal approvals and scheduling contractors and trades to ensure a seamless transformation from old to new.

profile:
At First Canadian Construction Corp, we specialize in creating complete customized home renovation solutions. Whether it’s your investment project or it’s your family home, after a free initial consultation and space analysis, our designers will present you with a set of options customized to fit your needs and budget. 
We cover everything from design to installation, and every single phase of the project is supervised to ensure it stays on schedule and meets our standard of excellence.
If you’re looking for a complete home remodel or just partial renovation, count on us for professional services. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Remodeling for Home Owners
You are updating your house into something new to meet your family's requirements or changing the layout and use of a space to increase your overall space function, or you are just restoring your home to good condition and making the look new again with some cosmetic upgrades, we help you achieve your goal within your planned budget.
We start with a meeting to hear about your requirements and your goals. Then we show you our previous works and our process, detailing all the steps we are going to take to make this project easy and enjoyable for you and your family.
After conducting a house survey, we will provide you with some designs options and associate budget.
During the process, we are with you all through the project to make sure you are kept up to date on all activities and that you and your family's concerns are in the forefront.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Remodeling for Investors:

If you are an investor who carefully choose and owns your own investment properties and you are planning to remodel or renovate to increase the value and earn the profit, we will be focused on those details that will result in the most value for the least amount of effort and cost.
Part of the process includes a market and neighborhood analysis, paying close attention to the other homes in the neighborhood to avoid over-improving the property or spending budget and effort on the spaces that doesn’t boost the value.

******

Our team of real estate professionals will survey the neighborhood and its potential to architect your remodeling approach and define a plan to maximize the investment profit.
This remolding plan is focused on increasing profit for our investors and not ours. We take benefit from our long lasting relationships.

******
Once our market analysis for your property is complete, you will be provided with our recommendations, the layout changes and any required upgrades including choosing right finishes for each room. All the details will be fully documented for your review and approval.

profile:
Mark's General Renovations is an experienced, full service, home renovation company, who you can depend on. We've built a solid reputation for outstanding home renovations that blend seamlessly with our customers' surroundings.

Whether you're looking to do a kitchen remodel or a home addition, MGR can help you to evaluate which changes and upgrades are right for you - while keeping your budget in mind. We'll also help with design ideas, and color consultation. We take special pride in the responsiveness and innovation of our home renovations, as well as the high quality of materials, products, craftsmanship and personal service we provide our clients.


Perhaps you need to turn a spare room into a cozy personal space, or remodel a bathroom or a Finished Basement. Maybe you require a Home Addition, or remodeling of your entire home. We can turn the house you have into the home you want; a home designed and remodeled to make you happy.


We work with home owners in Etobicoke, Mississauga, Oakville, and Burlington. We stand behind our work, warranty every job, and go to great lengths to ensure that our clients are involved in the design process - every step of the way. Our commitment to you, our customer, is to do the very best job, on time, on budget - guaranteed.


For many of our homeowners; we are pleased to be their "contractor for life." We look forward to the opportunity of earning your trust, and your business.

profile:
NO PROJECT TOO BIG OR TOO SMALL
Our main focus with small or large scale construction projects is to develop a clear understanding of your individual needs & budget. 
No matter how small or big your project is, we will strive to find a solution for your budget!

10 Years of Experience
If you’re looking for a friendly, fast, and affordable residential renovation company, MONTEMAYOR GC  has everything you need. 
As a locally owned business, we understand the unique needs and expenses that are associated with homeownership. 
We’re homeowners ourselves and we want you to be happy with our services. 
Our team of professionals has the necessary experience, equipment, and attitude to get the job done right—every time!

Our Mission
Here Montemayor GC we perform the highest level of quality service at fair prices and ensure complete customer satisfaction. 
We deliver professionalism, integrity and honesty with every job we take on.

We have maintained and continue to develop trusting relationships with our suppliers and customers. 
We strive to always provide an efficient service that will increase the lifespan of your walls and furnishings so that you, your family and friends can enjoy the living space you have always wanted. 

We only use the most advanced materials. You can rest assured that all jobs are handled with care; whether big or small.
To us, all restoration and renovation projects are important, and we strive to provide results that exceed your expectations.

Give us a call - 647-202-7085

profile:
We are a home renovation, remodel, and handyman services company. 

With over a decade of experience, we offer quality workmanship and attention to detail that fits any budget. We pride ourselves on attention to detail and customization of work for each project we undertake. Whether your project is indoors, outdoors, a small fix or a large-scale renovation, we are able to meet your need. 

BATHROOMS
Whether you are looking for luxury finishes or something simple and functional, we've got you covered. 

FLOORING
Vinyl and laminate floors are on the rise, as they are durable, versatile, and come in a variety of attractive colours, shades and textures. We also install hardwood floors and tiles.

DECKS
Have us build you a new deck or simply refurbish your existing deck.

OUTDOOR WORK
Let us revitalize your outdoor space! Whether its a new shed, a rock garden, pavers, stone features, or mulch and sod installation, we've got you covered. 

STORAGE SOLUTIONS
We'll help you create more storage space so you can better utilize your cold room/cantina, basement, garage, and shed. We can also convert your extra bedroom into a large walk-in closet. 

GENERAL HANDYMAN REPAIRS & MAINTENANCE
Drywall repairs, painting, staining, electrical fixture replacements, trim carpentry installations, and other home repair needs.

profile:
MjS Contracting is a full service general contractor, managing your custom home new build and renovation needs in the GTA and West end.  We believe there is no "one size fits all" solution and take special care with every client to produce a superior product that matches your vision.  And, if you have not conceptualized your project fully, we will work intuitively with you to assess your needs and consider your budget.  Whether it be a small bathroom retrofit or a full scale house remodel or new build, we have you covered!  Our promise to you is simple:  clear concise communication, transparent pricing, a roster of skilled and professional trades and delivering quality work within your comfort level.  

MjS family owned and operated, managing projects from the GTA to Hamilton.
services: Complete new build and renovations, from initial consultation to fully executed project, management of all scopes of work, exceptional relationship with trades to service your entire home
specialities: Custom built feature wall units, wine cellars, hardscape concrete formwork, feature ceilings, plumbing and more

profile:
At House and Homes Contracting, we see an unfinished basement as unfinished business. Enter our team — certified home building professionals who specialize in remodeling and repairing commercial and residential basements of all sizes, styles and configurations. Let us take care of your renovation or construction. If required, we have the tools to finance project of any size and budget.

House & Homes Contracting was founded in 2001 by Carlous Smith. Based in Toronto, Ontario the company provides residential and commercial renovations throughout the Greater Toronto & surrounding areas.

Unique to the industry, House & Homes Contracting provides quality and efficiency with a slogan stating we do it right, the right way.. This belief and slogan was established to provide peace of mind as home and business owners contemplate renovating a personal or commercial space. Included with our services is a complementary follow-up visit one year after the completion of all projects.
name: House And Homes Contracting

specialities: We specialize in management of full scale construction and remodeling of existing dwelling spaces. That means we can build your home from the foundation up or work with your existing space to update or enhance the space you are working with. From Additions to Custom Builds, from a driveway complete with interlocked walkway to the backyard fence which establishes your property boundaries and provides safety and security, we cover all the components in-between to make your home perfect for you and your family to enjoy for decades to come.

profile:
PLT Flooring is one of the most competitive companies in the GTA in terms of quality and prices. We are unique, as we work solely on a Shop at Home basis read more This way, we maximize our savings that are then passed on to our customers. 

We are specialized in installation and refinishing of hardwood floors and stairs.   Also we provide professional and custom renovation Services for all your inside remodeling projects, including basement, kitchen, bathroom and all areas of your house. And we’ll make it happen at a price you’ll love too.
services:

Kitchen remodeling

Phinesse Construction Group specializes in five unique groups of service areas which are Kitchens, Bathrooms, Basements, Accessibility and Assembly. 

Our motto is to " Make your home right for you." We are competitively priced and have the knowledge to create your vision you dream of and if you like offer advice to bring your dreams to reality. Our company is built on the principle of trust, respect and finesse. 
We use state of the art technology to keep track of all projects, this allows wide open visible communication between you and our team. 

Our team creates a project schedule and gives clients their own portal login to be able to track job progress, request changes and make progress payments, if applicable.

We stand by our workmanship with a two-year warranty

profile:
Fixall Restoration is a locally owned and operated disaster restoration company located in Etobicoke. Although our office is in Etobicoke, our restoration professionals operate in all Greater Toronto Area, including Vaughan,  Mississauga, Brampton, Markham, etc.

We clean and restore properties damaged from flood, fire, smoke, mold. Our team is certified and licensed in the emergency restoration field.

We also have lots of experience in the restoration field in houses and businesses all around GTA and northern Ontario.

Our responsibility is to inform and communicate with you about all cleaning and restoration procedures we follow. Also we are here to answer any other questions you might have for us. We offer restoration services 24/7 according to your needs.
